<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/config/resolve"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resolves and merges config values based on context conditions, applying overrides and merge strategies to produce the final configuration.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"prefix","in":"query","style":"form","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"explode":true},{"name":"version","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"show_reasoning","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}},{"name":"context_id","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"resolve_remote","in":"query","description":"Intended for control resolution. If true, evaluates and includes remote cohort-based contexts during config resolution.","schema":{"type":"boolean","description":"Intended for control resolution. If true, evaluates and includes remote cohort-based contexts during config resolution."}},{"name":"x-merge-strategy","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["MERGE","REPLACE"],"title":"MergeStrategy"}},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-workspace","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
